"The head of Nefarian: Brood of Deathwing."
Chance on hit: Increases Strength by 300 for 8 sec.

Use: Infuses you with Arcane energy, causing your next Arcane Shot fired within 10 sec to detonate at the target. The Arcane Detonation will deal 185 to 215 damage to enemies near the target. (2 Min Cooldown)
Use: Empowers your pet, increasing pet damage by 100% and increasing pet armor by 100% for 30 sec. This spell will only affect an Imp, Succubus, Voidwalker, or Felhunter. (5 Min Cooldown)
Use: Decreases the mana cost of all Druid shapeshifting forms by 100% for 20 sec. (5 Min Cooldown)
Use: Heals yourself for 15% of your maximum health, and increases your maximum health by 15% for 20 sec. (5 Min Cooldown)
Use: Energizes a Paladin with light, increasing melee attack speed by 25% and spell casting speed by 33% for 20 sec. (5 Min Cooldown)
Equip: Increases the block value of your shield by 19.
